body.name: HP EliteBook 840 G5 Business Laptop
body.short_description: Powerful business laptop with Intel Core i5, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD. Excellent condition, perfect for professionals.
body.long_description:
HP EliteBook 840 G5 Business Laptop

This premium business laptop offers exceptional performance and reliability for professionals on the go.

Key Features

  • Processor: Intel Core i5-8250U (8th Gen)
  • Memory: 8GB DDR4 RAM
  • Storage: 256GB SSD
  • Display: 14-inch Full HD (1920x1080)
  • Graphics: Intel UHD Graphics 620
  • Battery: Up to 10 hours
  • Weight: 1.54 kg

Condition

This laptop is in excellent used condition with minimal wear. Screen and keyboard are in perfect working order. Battery health is good.

What's Included

  • HP EliteBook 840 G5 Laptop
  • Original Charger
  • 1 Year IT Repair Hub Warranty
body.seo_title: HP EliteBook 840 G5 Used Laptop - Business Laptop Pakistan | IT Repair Hub
body.meta_description: Buy HP EliteBook 840 G5 used laptop in Pakistan. Intel i5, 8GB RAM, 256GB SSD. Excellent condition with 1 year warranty. Best price guaranteed.
